plot: A young woman supports her fiance's tuition by working in a textile mill. When he gets offered a job after college, she sees that their engagement is holding him back so she leaves him. ...
title: Eonjena tain
plot_es: A young woman supports her fiance's tuition by working in a textile mill. When he gets offered a job after college, she sees that their engagement is holding him back so she leaves him. ...
